DOC.brief_title: Individual Family Therapy Children With Anxiety Disorders
DOC.detailed_description: Children parent complete comprehensive diagnostic assessment determine eligibility . The assessment include individual diagnostic interview child , interviews parent , write observation child family member teacher . Participants randomly assign receive individual cognitive behavioral therapy ( ICBT ) , family CBT ( FCBT ) , education/support/attention ( ESA ) 5 month . Children ICBT group meet individually therapist . In FCBT ESA treatment group , child parent meet weekly therapist . At end treatment 1 year follow treatment completion , family complete another assessment determine effectiveness treatment reduce short- long-term anxiety symptom child .
